uid.description: The unique identifier of the VoiceCallSetting entity

staff_uid.description: The unique identifier of the staff receiving the forwarded call

forward_number.description: The phone number of the staff receiving the forwarded call

dedicated_number.description: The dedicated number of the business receiving calls from clients

forwarding_enabled.description: Indicates if voice call forwarding is enabled

call_forwarding_policy.description: Specifies the conditions under which calls are forwarded based on staff availability

staff_weekly_availability_uid.description: The unique identifier of the staff weekly availability schedule

voice_scripts.description: A key-value JSON object defining the voice scripts to play for the caller

external_app_config.description:
A configuration JSON object defining the external AI app managing the voice call.
The object defines three keys:
app_name: the name of the app used (for internal use)
full_url: the endpoint related to that app
method: the HTTP method that should be used (GET/POST)

created_at.description: The date and time when the VoiceCallSetting entity was created

updated_at.description: The date and time when the VoiceCallSetting entity was updated

deleted_at.description: The date and time when the VoiceCallSetting entity was deleted

voice_scripts.greeting_message: Hi, The call will be forwarded soon, please wait.
